import './new.css'; import { useNew } from './useNew'; import Spinner from '../../components/spinner/spinner'; const NewPost = () => { const { handleAddFeild, handleChange2, handleSubmit, title, links, image, body, counter, setBody, setImage, setTitle, setCounter, isLoading } = useNew(); return (
setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder='Title' />
setImage(e.target.files)} multiple />
{Array.from(Array(counter)).map((count, index) => { return (
handleChange2(index, 'name', e.target.value)} placeholder='Item Name' /> handleChange2(index, 'link', e.target.value)} placeholder='Item Link' />
); })}
); }; export default NewPost;
